page.title: 05Housing ,Gipsey Bridge
page.content: Most of the houses in this area are made of bricks. There are houses being built in the village. Some houses are older and you can tell that by the state of the bricks ,they are a different colour and they are a bit more crumbly.There are no houses or other buildings that are more than two hundred years old because before that time this area was uninhabited fen land. There has been a lot of building in recent years.A new estate, Castlegate is being built off Leagate road .Now most of the houses in the village are new ones.There are about 7 plots waiting to be built on still in the centre of the village.Most of the houses are owner occupied by people who have no connection with farming.
